summary: This bill, the "Ensuring Continued Access to Funding for Colonias Act," aims to amend the Cranston-Gonzalez National Affordable Housing Act. It focuses on updating the eligibility requirements for the Community Development Block Grant Colonia Set-Aside Program, specifically by increasing the metropolitan statistical area population limit. This change is intended to ensure continued access to funding for colonias, which are typically unincorporated communities in the U.S. near the border.
